DIVYA VENKATACHALAM 
Mobile: +1(248) 250-0433 Email:  
divya.sakthivel@yahoo.com 
 
 
PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY 
• Dynamic and dedicated individual with around 6+ years of experience in software development, Sound 
knowledge of end-to-end development of software products from requirement analysis to system study, 
designing, coding, testing, and debugging. 
• Highly innovative and pragmatic in thinking with willingness to learn and adapt to changing environments 
and new technology. Interacting with clients to gather the requirements. 
 
TECHNICAL SUMMARY 
• Expert in development utilizing the Microsoft Power Platform – Power Apps, Power Automate, Power 
Pages (Portals), Power BI, SharePoint, Azure DevOps, Azure AI, Dataverse (Common Data Service) and 
Dynamics 365 virtual entities.

Pages (Portals), Power BI, SharePoint, Azure DevOps, Azure AI, Dataverse (Common Data Service) and 
Dynamics 365 virtual entities. 
• Hands-on with Power Pages (Portal) in creating custom page templates, web templates and content 
snippets with creating web link sets in Power Pages 
• Experience in writing Kusto Quires to enable traffic analysis, creating Application Insights resources and 
creating dashboards in AI while monitoring user login and number of visits on each page of the application. 
• Hands-on in optimizing the Power apps using various delegation methodology (Lookup, Filter, Search). 
• Experience in developing custom solutions and interfaces leveraging Microsoft Power Platforms such as 
Power Apps, Power Automate, Power Pages and Power BI.  
• Hands-on in Azure DevOps Rest API calls to repository in Power Automate utilizing Power Apps  
• Experienced in writing DAX queries and designing Power BI dashboards & reports and embedding with 
PowerApps.

• Experienced in writing DAX queries and designing Power BI dashboards & reports and embedding with 
PowerApps. 
• Expert in Import/Export solution/package from one environment to another. 
• Hands-on in creating SharePoint sites, Site Columns, Content Type, List, Libraries, and Document Set in 
SharePoint. 
• Expert in Configuring the Groups, Roles, Users, Permissions in SharePoint. 
• Extensive experience in handling Threshold issues by Creation/utilization of Indexed Columns & filtered 
views. 
• Experienced in SharePoint migrations from SharePoint 2010 to 2016 using ‘ShareGate’ migration tool. 
• Hands-on in SQL Server with creating Tables, Views, Stored Procedures, Triggers, and Functions. 
• Extensive experience in configuring and developing K2 SmartObjects, K2 SmartForms, and K2 Workflows 
for list and libraries. 
• Experience in scheduling and managing the K2 workflows to meet business needs.

for list and libraries. 
• Experience in scheduling and managing the K2 workflows to meet business needs. 
• Exposure in K2 interfaces such as K2 Designer, K2 Management, K2 Workspace and K2 Web parts such as 
K2 SmartForms Viewer and K2 Worklist.

2 | P a g e

MAR-2021 to Present

STG InfoTech INDIA LLP, Chennai India

PROJECT/CLIENT SUMMARY 
Microsoft Bellevue, Washington, USA [Mar 2021 to Oct 2022] 
Software Design Engineer – Microsoft Power Platform 
 
Worked  as  Software  Design  Engineer,  part  of  BAG Supportability team.  Built  &  supported  following internal

Software Design Engineer – Microsoft Power Platform 
 
Worked  as  Software  Design  Engineer,  part  of  BAG Supportability team.  Built  &  supported  following internal 
applications such as Spectrum Portal in Power Pages, Power Assist in Power Apps & Rewards & Recognition in 
Power Apps. participated in Microsoft global hackathon 2021 & award winner in 2022.  
Roles & Responsibilities 
• Involved in requirement analysis and clarification meetings with the internal operation team. 
• Developed multiple canvas Apps by leveraging Power Apps and its delegation methodology.  
• Developed the Power Apps screens by integrating Azure DevOps Repository through middle layer of 
Power Automate REST API. 
• Developed the various types of Power Automate such as Instant, Scheduled and Automated Flows. 
• Developed the Power Pages (Power Portal) by leveraging web forms, entity forms and liquid templates to 
improve the quality of the portal.

• Developed the Power Pages (Power Portal) by leveraging web forms, entity forms and liquid templates to 
improve the quality of the portal. 
• Implemented traffic analysis report on Power Pages to monitor the traffic using Kusto Query and Azure AI.  
• Designed multiple entities, views and entity forms in Dataverse (CDS) and integrating them in Power Apps. 
• Performed the packaging and deployment (export/ import) of the Power Apps and Power Automate from 
lower environment to higher environment to follow ALM Process. 
• Created and managed the various Power BI Reports using Power BI Desktop and deployed them into 
power BI services and organized as important reports in Dashboards & Workspaces.  
• Created the DAX queries to pull the data from SQL Analysis Services and Dynamic 365 Virtual Entities. 
• Embedded various Power BI Visual & Dashboard in Canvas Apps and Power Pages 
• Created multiple functional & test-case documentation to support the Application.

• Embedded various Power BI Visual & Dashboard in Canvas Apps and Power Pages 
• Created multiple functional & test-case documentation to support the Application. 
 
Environment: Power Apps, Power Automate, Power Pages (Power Portal), Power BI, Power BI Services, Dataverse 
(Common Data Service - CDS), Azure DevOps, Rest API, PBI Datasets, Liquid Templates, Kusto Query, CSS, DAX 
Query, Dynamics 365, HTML, jQuery

3 | P a g e 
 
 
Trelleborg Sealing Solutions, Bangalore, India [May 2019 to Sep 2019] 
Senior Developer - Digital Process 
 
Worked  as  senior  developer  as  part  Digital  Process  team, The  Export  Trade  Approval  (ETA)  is  a  country 
shipping  goods  and  services  out  of  the  port  of  the  country.  In international  trade,  we  export  goods  and 
services  to  sell  from  our  home  country  to  other  markets  (other countries)  worldwide.  The  EAT  would 
manage all the sales and discounts with multiple approval processes depending upon the total value. 
 
Roles & Responsibilities 
• Involved in requirement analysis and clarification meetings with the internal operation team. 
• Configured the Site Column, Content Type, SharePoint List & Library 
• Configured and customized the SharePoint forms using Power Apps 
• Configured the Power automate such as Instant, Scheduled and Automated Flows 
• Scheduled and managed the power automate for the repetitive tasks.

• Configured the Power automate such as Instant, Scheduled and Automated Flows 
• Scheduled and managed the power automate for the repetitive tasks. 
• Performed the deployment (import/export) of the Power Apps and Power Automate from Stage 
environment to production environment. 
• Participated in daily stand-up meetings / video conference meetings with the on-site team. 
• Created functional documentation to support the application. 
Environment: SharePoint Online, Power Apps, Power Automate, Dataverse (CDS) 
 
Stellantis (Formerly Fiat Chrysler Automobiles) MI USA [Jan 2018 to Apr 2018] 
Software Engineer | SharePoint 2010 to 2016 Migration 
 
Worked   as   Software   Engineer   as   part   of   SharePoint   Migration   team, FCA   corporate decided to 
decommission the existing SharePoint 2010 environment and migrate all the existing sites around 1200+ to 
SharePoint 2016. As part of this process, FCA identified the list of applications to be migrated by 2019 based

SharePoint 2016. As part of this process, FCA identified the list of applications to be migrated by 2019 based 
on  the  complexity, usability,  and  ownership to solve the migration concerns. All  custom  Nintex  Form  and 
Nintex workflow to be converted/Rebuilt in K2 SmartForms & K2 Process (workflow) respectively.  
 
Migrate the SharePoint 2010 to 2016 using ShareGate  migration Tool which content  less than 10 GB., and 
more  than  10  GB  sites  were  migrated  using  the  Content  DB  migration  with  involvement  of  Infrastructure 
team.  
 
Roles & Responsibilities 
• Involved in analysis of existing Nintex Form & Workflow and prepared the documentation and 
participated in clarification meetings with the internal operation team. 
• Performed the ShareGate migration using ShareGate tool.  
• Rebuilt the customized Nintex forms using K2 SmartForms and Rebuilt the Nintex Workflows using K2 
Process / Workflows. 
• Configured in Scheduling Workflows in K2 Management

• Rebuilt the customized Nintex forms using K2 SmartForms and Rebuilt the Nintex Workflows using K2 
Process / Workflows. 
• Configured in Scheduling Workflows in K2 Management 
• Involved in UAT meeting and fixes to make closure to production deployment.  
• Performed K2 Package & Deployment from migration environment to production environment. 
• Created functional documentation to support the application. 
Environment: SharePoint 2010, SharePoint 2016, ShareGate, K2 Designer, K2 SmartForms, K2 Process, K2 
Management, K2 Package & Deployment Tool, Nintex Form, Nintex Workflow, HTML, CSS, JavaScript/ JQuery

4 | P a g e 
 
 
Master Brand Cabinets Inc (MBCI). Jasper, Indiana USA [Nov 2013 – Dec 2017] 
Software Engineer | SharePoint Application Support 
 
Worked  as a  Software Engineer  in  the  Support  team,  supporting One Touch application for managing 
Communications, Administration, Marketing, Orders, Customer Data and Training.  
 
This application is the single  point/ centralized application for the organization related with their activities 
to manage and improve the business. Enhancements & Issues were reported in the ticketing system.  
 
Roles & Responsibilities: 
• Perform the analysis and gather the requirement of assigned tickets (break/fix, enhancements) in queue. 
• Perform the impact analysis & document them, develop the solution approach, and estimate the effort 
required to complete the assignment.  
• In between, work with business / on-site team for additional clarifications if required. 
• Implement the solution, perform the sanity test, and update status in ticket.

• In between, work with business / on-site team for additional clarifications if required. 
• Implement the solution, perform the sanity test, and update status in ticket. 
• Follow-up with business to get UAT sign-off. 
• Perform the production deployment upon the successful user acceptance testing (UAT) 
• Update the final status in the ticketing system. 
• Participated in daily stand-up meetings with the on-site team.  
Environments: SharePoint 2010, HTML, CSS, jQuery & CAML Query 
 
EDUCATION SUMMARY 
• Bachelor of technology in Information Technology (B. Tech (IT)), Anna University, TN, India 2011 
• Master of Business Administration in Systems Management (M.B.A), Madras University, TN, India, 2013 
 
CERTIFICATIONS & ACHIVEMENTS

• Microsoft Power Platform Fundamentals (PL-900) 
• Microsoft Global Hackathon 2022 Award Winner
